title: Mike Smith, Ben Volin Interviews (Football 1/30)
description:
Will Brinson is joined in Atlanta by Bryant McFadden and Pete Prisco to chat Super Bowl storylines. Then Will and Pete are joined by former Falcons head coach Mike Smith to further discuss the big game. Then Patriots beat writer for the Boston Globe, Ben Volin, chats the New England side of things on the Pick Six Rundown. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
